resources:
Switches and the app communicate to each other via a MQTT broker. User is not required to setup connection to a MQTT broker if using a default broker. Connection Name Should be an easy to remember name URL to MQTT broker Ex, tcp://iot.eclipse.org:1883 Username required by MQTT broker Leave blank if not required Password required by MQTT broker Leave blank if not required CUSTOM CONNECTION
AiOhTea Collection Setup device... Button ADD SWITCH
1.Enter ID and Description of a switch that will be/was attached to network\n 2.Press ADD SWITCH button to add the switch to your device collection.
Switch Description Such as \"Irrigation system\" Switch Name Switch Password About... IoT makes life easy and enjoyable like having tea. Processing..., please wait!
Custom connection...
Device\'s details... Delete device...
DEVIVE INFO </!--> "Device is offline or not synced!"
OTHER INFO </!--> "Confirmation" "Do you want to ACTIVATE device's timers?" "Do you want to DEACTIVATE device's timers?" "Do you want to DELETE device: "
SWITCH STATUS</!--> "ON at" "OFF at" "OFFLINE" "Tap to find the switch"
SWITCH CONTROL MESSAGES</!--> "Successfully establishing connection" "Error in establishing connection" "Listening switch's status" "Error in listening switch" "Command sent" "Command sent error" "Switch offline, could not send command"
SWITCH SETUP</!--> Should be an easy to remember name Password to access the switch WiFi access point name where the switch will connect to WiFi password to access to WiFi access point
SETUP SWITCH WiFi SSID WiFi password Add new switch to device list can not be empty.
TIMER SETTINGS </!--> Interval settings Timer settings On after: Off after: On at: Off at: sec(s) Timer 1 Timer 2 Timer 3 Setup Cancel
The device will be started after n seconds since last stop and stopped m seconds since last start. If the device has been started/stopped manually before, corresponding timer will be bypassed.
The device will be started/stopped at specific times. If the device has been started/stopped manually before, corresponding timer will be bypassed.
